map.title: Akai Travel Map
map.noTracks: No Haachama tracks found in this prefecture

infoPanel.description: Interactive map for finding where Chama has been!

body.p2:
This site displays the locations of photos posted by "<1>Akai Haato" across various prefectures in Japan, helping fans to enjoy their <2>Seichi-junrei even more.
You may also share your own photos using her fan-activity tag <3>#推し活はあとん日記!
body.p3:
Please enjoy sightseeing respectfully by following proper <1>Japanese manners.
We ask that you engage with others courteously, without promoting political debates or nationalistic claims.
body.li1: This is an unofficial fan site for Akai Haato, a VTuber affiliated with Hololive. We are not affiliated with Cover Corp or Hololive Production in any way.
body.li2: The place names shown are based on geographic data and map tiles provided by third parties, and may not reflect all perspectives.
body.li3: Also while we strive to provide accurate information, errors may occur.
